thread.title: Gartner to Report Third Quarter 2015 Financial Results on November 5, 2015
thread.title_full: Gartner to Report Third Quarter 2015 Financial Results on November 5, 2015

title: Gartner to Report Third Quarter 2015 Financial Results on November 5, 2015
text:
Gartner to Report Third Quarter 2015 Financial Results on November 5, 2015 [October 16, 2015] Tweet 
Gartner ( News - Alert ), Inc. (NYSE:IT), the leading provider of research and analysis on the global information technology industry, today announced that it plans to report its financial results for the third quarter 2015 before the market opens on Thursday, November 5, 2015. 
The Company plans to host a webcast conference call to discuss its financial results for the third quarter 2015 at 8:30 a.m. Eastern time on Thursday, November 5, 2015. Listeners will be asked to pre-register for the call. 11/05/2015 8:30 AM Eastern Time U.S. Dial In: 
https://www.theconferencingservice.com/prereg/key.process?key=PUYU3MKM4 
Listenerscan also access the webcast live on the Internet at http://investor.gartner.com . A replay of the webcast will be available for approximately 90 days following the call. 
About Gartner 
Gartner, Inc. (NYSE:IT) is the world's leading information technology research and advisory company. The company delivers the technology-related insight necessary for its clients to make the right decisions, every day. From CIOs and senior IT leaders in corporations and government agencies, to business leaders in high-tech and telecom enterprises and professional services firms, to technology investors, Gartner is the valuable partner to clients in approximately 10,000 distinct enterprises worldwide. Through the resources of Gartner Research, Gartner Executive Programs, Gartner Consulting and Gartner Events, Gartner works with every client to research, analyze and interpret the business of IT within the context of their individual role. Founded in 1979, Gartner is headquartered in Stamford, Connecticut, USA, and has 6,800 associates, including more than 1,500 research analysts and consultants, and clients in 90 countries. For more information, visit www.gartner.com . View source version on businesswire.com: http://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20151016005101/en/
